name: Out of Ammo
description: An intense virtual reality strategy game, Out of Ammo has you constructing defenses, calling in artillery, issuing orders, and even taking control of your soldiers directly in order to survive for as long as you can!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8 or 10 Processor: Intel i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 6 GB available space Additional Notes: Requires room-scale VR (HTC Vive or Oculus with Touch controllers) with 2m x 1.5m space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8 or 10 Processor: Intel i7 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 980 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 6 GB available space Additional Notes: Requires room-scale VR (HTC Vive or Oculus with Touch controllers) with 2m x 1.5m space

reviews.review_text: Good concept but lacking in content. To put my problems with this game briefly, I did not buy an HTC Vive to play iPad games.

Cool concept that grows incredibly stale after the first game or so. There is no progression and very little meaningful strategic decisions possible by the player. Production value is incredibly low on some elements, some voice overs sound like the developers mates reading a script. A lot of potential in this concept but at present it feels thrown together into a minimum viable product and sold, much like the developers previous game only this time there is no human interaction to create anything resembling meaningful gameplay. I am refunding.
I now have PTSD caused by the endless waves of terrorists...11/10 would trip over my Vive cable trying to hide from terrorists again.
This game is really fun, I enjoyed it besides those few bugs. I give it a 3. place after Rec Room and Raw Date
Very neat game. Love the mix between RTS and FPS, plus the playing with toy soldiers feel it has when in the RTS mode. The missions are quite good too. Definitely my favorite game right now.
Amazing first person shoter game. Got it three days ago and already have about 3 hours
